Actions.Name: Rumble
Effects: Releases a medium blast on the attack target as an area effect, dealing 3 piercing damage again.
Deals bonus damage for every object or pit in the area.

CustomComponents.Name: Round 3+
CustomComponents.Description: Stuns any character on an object or inside a pit in the area.

Actions.Name: Seismic Rumble
Actions.Description: Characters are shoved 1 in the direction of the line, in any order.
Actions.Collide: Character is shattered and takes 1 piercing damage twice.

Actions.Name: Upheaval
Actions.Description: Summon a height 1 boulder object or a a pit in free space in range 6.
